statements: SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE part_type='Tool';
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE supplier_id=1;
SELECT part_id, part_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT part_name FROM inventory WHERE part_type='Fastener' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE part_type = 'widget' ORDER BY part_name DESC
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity >= 100 ORDER BY part_name
SELECT part_id, part_name, supplier_id FROM inventory WHERE supplier_id IS NOT NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_parts FROM inventory WHERE part_type IN ('gadget', 'tool')
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE supplier_id = (SELECT MAX(supplier_id) FROM inventory)
SELECT part_id, part_name, part_description, part_quantity, part_price FROM drone_parts;
SELECT part_name, part_quantity FROM drone_parts WHERE part_quantity > 10;
SELECT part_name, part_price FROM drone_parts ORDER BY part_price DESC;
SELECT acc_name, acc_quantity FROM accessories WHERE acc_quantity < 50;
SELECT * FROM accessories WHERE acc_price BETWEEN 5.00 AND 20.00;
SELECT part_name, part_description, part_price FROM drone_parts WHERE part_quantity > 10 ORDER BY part_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM drone_parts INNER JOIN accessories ON drone_parts.part_id = accessories.acc_id WHERE drone_parts.part_quantity < accessories.acc_quantity;
SELECT part_name, acc_name, part_quantity * acc_quantity AS total_quantity FROM drone_parts, accessories;
SELECT AVG(part_price) AS average_price FROM drone_parts;
SELECT part_name, SUM(part_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM drone_parts GROUP BY part_name HAVING SUM(part_quantity) > 50;
SELECT * FROM parts ORDER BY part_name ASC;
SELECT part_category, COUNT(*) AS total_quantity FROM parts GROUP BY part_category;
SELECT * FROM accessories WHERE price > 50;
SELECT accessory_name, compatible_parts FROM accessories ORDER BY accessory_name DESC;
SELECT part_name, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM parts JOIN maintenance_logs ON parts.part_id = maintenance_logs.part_id WHERE maintenance_type = 'repair';
SELECT part_name, part_category, quantity FROM parts WHERE part_category = 'engine' ORDER BY part_name ASC;
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM accessories WHERE accessory_name LIKE '%bolt%';
SELECT parts.part_name, accessories.accessory_name FROM parts INNER JOIN accessories ON parts.part_id = accessories.accessory_id WHERE parts.quantity < 10;
SELECT part_name, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM parts JOIN maintenance_logs ON parts.part_id = maintenance_logs.part_id WHERE maintenance_type = 'repair' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT accessory_name, price FROM accessories WHERE price > (SELECT AVG(price) FROM accessories) AND price < (SELECT MAX(price) FROM accessories);
SELECT * FROM drone_parts;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM drone_parts WHERE part_category = 'Propellers';
SELECT AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM drone_parts;
SELECT drone_model, purchase_date FROM drones ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT repair_id, repair_type, technician_name FROM repairs WHERE repair_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM drone_parts ORDER BY part_name DESC, price ASC;
SELECT part_name, quantity, price FROM drone_parts WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT part_category, COUNT(*) AS total_parts FROM drone_parts GROUP BY part_category;
SELECT * FROM drones WHERE manufacture_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT repair_id, technician_name, repair_date, repair_type FROM repairs WHERE repair_type = 'maintenance' ORDER BY repair_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM drone_parts;
SELECT part_id, part_name, quantity FROM drone_parts ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT part_name, price FROM drone_parts WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE technician_id = 12345;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM suppliers;
SELECT * FROM drone_parts ORDER BY part_name DESC, price ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM drone_parts WHERE supplier_id = 3 AND quantity > 10;
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(part_id) AS total_parts FROM drone_parts GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING total_parts > 5 ORDER BY total_parts DESC;
SELECT part_name, price FROM drone_parts JOIN drone_accessories ON drone_parts.part_id = drone_accessories.accessory_id WHERE drone_parts.price > 100 OR drone_accessories.price < 50;
SELECT technician_name, experience_years, specialty FROM technicians WHERE experience_years >= 5 ORDER BY experience_years DESC, technician_name;
